TITLE_UR: پلٹ کر پھر کبھی اس نے پکارا ہی نہیں ہے
TITLE_EN: He never called out again after turning away
CONTENT:
پلٹ کر پھر کبھی اس نے پکارا ہی نہیں ہے
وہ جس کی یاد سے دل کو کنارا ہی نہیں ہے

محبت کھیل ایسا تو نہیں ہم لوٹ جائیں
کہ اس میں جیت بھی ہو گی خسارا ہی نہیں ہے

کبھی وہ جگنوؤں کو مٹھیوں میں قید کرنا
مگر اب تو ہمیں یہ سب گوارا ہی نہیں ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
He never called out again after turning away
For whom the heart finds no shore from memory

Love is not such a game that we can return
Where victory also means no loss

Sometimes capturing fireflies in fists
But now we no longer tolerate all this
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: بہت تاریک سہرا ہو گیا ہے
TITLE_EN: The desert has become very dark
CONTENT:
بہت تاریک سہرا ہو گیا ہے
ہوا کو شور گہرا ہو گیا ہے

کسی کے لمس کا یہ معجزہ ہے
بدن سارا سنہرا ہو گیا ہے

یہ دل دیکھوں کہ جس کے چار جانب
تری یادوں کا پہرا ہو گیا ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
The desert has become very dark
The wind has deepened its noise

This is the miracle of someone's touch
The entire body has turned golden

I see this heart, on all four sides
Your memories stand guard
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: ہمارے درمیان عہد شبِ ماہتاب زندہ ہے
TITLE_EN: Between us, the promise of moonlit night lives on
CONTENT:
ہمارے درمیان عہد شبِ ماہتاب زندہ ہے
ہوا چپکے سے کہتی ہے ابھی اک خواب زندہ ہے

یہ کس کی نرم خوشبو ہے مری شب کی حویلی میں
یہ کیسا رقص مستی ہے اے دل بے تاب زندہ ہے

کہاں وہ سانولی شامیں کہاں وہ ریشمی باتیں
مگر اک لمس حیراں کا ابھی زرناب زندہ ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
Between us, the promise of moonlit night lives on
The wind whispers softly, a dream still lives on

Whose soft fragrance is in my night's mansion?
What ecstatic dance is this, O restless heart, still alive?

Where are those dusky evenings, where those silken conversations?
But a bewildering touch still lives on, golden-threaded
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: گریز شب سے، سحر سے کلام رکھتے تھے
TITLE_EN: We used to converse with the escape of night, with dawn
CONTENT:
گریز شب سے، سحر سے کلام رکھتے تھے
کبھی وہ دن تھے کہ زلفوں میں شام رکھتے تھے

تمہارے ہاتھ لگے ہیں تو جو کرو سو کرو
وگرنہ تم سے تو ہم سو غلام رکھتے تھے

ہمیں بھی گھیر لیا گھر کے زعم نے تو کھلا
کچھ اور لوگ بھی اس میں کلام رکھتے تھے
TRANSLATION_EN:
We used to converse with the escape of night, with dawn
Those were the days when we kept evening in tresses

Now that your hands have touched, do as you please
Otherwise we kept a hundred slaves like you

We too were surrounded by the pride of home, so it opened
Some other people also had a say in this
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اب کس سے کہیں اور کوئی سنے جو حال تمہارے بعد ہوا
TITLE_EN: Now who should we tell, who will listen to what happened after you?
CONTENT:
اب کس سے کہیں اور کوئی سنے جو حال تمہارے بعد ہوا
اس دل کی جھیل سی آنکھوں میں اک خواب بہت برباد ہوا

یہ ہجر ہوا بھی دشمن ہے اس نام کے سارے رنگوں کا
وہ نام جو میرے ہونٹوں پر خوشبو کی طرح آباد ہوا

اس شہر میں کتنے چہرے تھے کچھ یاد نہیں سب بھول گئے
اک شخص کتابوں جیسا تھا وہ شخص زبانی یاد ہوا
TRANSLATION_EN:
Now who should we tell, who will listen to what happened after you?
In the lake-like eyes of this heart, a dream was greatly ruined

This separation is also an enemy to all colors of that name
That name which settled on my lips like fragrance

How many faces were in this city, I don't remember, all forgotten
There was a person like books, that person is remembered by heart
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: ابھی تو کچھ بھی نہیں ہوا مجھے
TITLE_EN: Nothing has happened to me yet
CONTENT:
ابھی تو کچھ بھی نہیں ہوا مجھے
یہ دل کیوں گھبرا رہا ہے مجھے

اس سے کہنا میرے آنے تک
وہ آنکھوں میں سما رہا ہے مجھے

رات بھر جاگنے کی عادت ہے
نیند اب آزما رہا ہے مجھے
TRANSLATION_EN:
Nothing has happened to me yet
Why is this heart so anxious, troubling me?

Tell him until I come
He is fitting into my eyes, consuming me

The habit of staying awake all night persists
Sleep now tests me, eluding me
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کے آنے کی خبر کچھ تو سناتی کیوں نہیں
TITLE_EN: Why don't you give some news of his arrival?
CONTENT:
اس کے آنے کی خبر کچھ تو سناتی کیوں نہیں
تم جو میرے پاس ہوتی ہو بتاتی کیوں نہیں

درد اتنا ہے کہ اب لفظوں میں ڈھل بھی نہ سکے
درد کو تم اپنے آنسوؤں میں بہاتی کیوں نہیں

میں نے سوچا تھا کہ تم آؤ گی کچھ دن بعد
آج کل تم میرے خوابوں میں بھی آتی کیوں نہیں
TRANSLATION_EN:
Why don't you give some news of his arrival?
You who are with me, why don't you tell?

The pain is such that it cannot now be shaped into words
Why don't you let the pain flow in your tears?

I thought you would come after some days
These days, why don't you even come in my dreams?
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کے لہجے میں جو نرمی سی ہے
TITLE_EN: The softness that is in his voice
CONTENT:
اس کے لہجے میں جو نرمی سی ہے
اس کو اندازِ محبت نہ کہو

دور تک پھیلی ہوئی تنہائی
اس کو ہم عشق کی دولت نہ کہو

دل دھڑکتا ہے تو کیا ہوتا ہے
اس کو کھو جانے کی حسرت نہ کہو
TRANSLATION_EN:
The softness that is in his voice
Do not call it a style of love

The loneliness spread far and wide
Do not call it the wealth of love for us

The heart beats, so what happens?
Do not call it the regret of losing it
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اسے چاہا تو بہت تھا مگر کہہ نہ سکے
TITLE_EN: We loved him so much but could not say
CONTENT:
اسے چاہا تو بہت تھا مگر کہہ نہ سکے
دل میں رکھا تو بہت تھا مگر کہہ نہ سکے

تم نے پوچھا بھی تو کیا منہ سے کہتے
بات سمجھی تو بہت تھی مگر کہہ نہ سکے

کتنی خاموشی سے گزر گئی عمر
اس سے کہنا تھا مگر کہہ نہ سکے
TRANSLATION_EN:
We loved him so much but could not say
Kept him in the heart so much but could not say

Even when you asked, what could we say with our mouths?
The matter was understood so well but could not say

How silently life passed by
We had to tell him but could not say
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اسے ہم بھول جائیں گے مگر کب
TITLE_EN: We will forget him, but when?
CONTENT:
اسے ہم بھول جائیں گے مگر کب
یہ سوچیں دن گزارا کیسے ہو گا

وہ ملتا ہے تو پھر دل چاہتا ہے
وہ ملے تو یہ نظارا کیسے ہو گا

بہت مشکل ہے اس شہر میں اب
کوئی اپنا سا ہمارا کیسے ہو گا
TRANSLATION_EN:
We will forget him, but when?
We think, how will we get through the days?

When he is met, then the heart desires
If he meets, how will this spectacle be?

It is very difficult now in this city
How will anyone be like our own?
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: رکتا بھی نہیں ٹھیک سے، چلتا بھی نہیں ہے
TITLE_EN: It neither stops properly, nor does it move
CONTENT:
رکتا بھی نہیں ٹھیک سے، چلتا بھی نہیں ہے
یہ دل کہ تیرے بعد، سنبھلتا بھی نہیں ہے

اک عمر سے ہم اُس کی تمنا میں ہیں بے خواب
وہ چاند جو آنگن میں، اترتا بھی نہیں ہے

پھر دل میں تیری یاد کے، منظر ہیں فروزاں
ایسے میں کوئی، دیکھنے والا بھی نہیں ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
It neither stops properly, nor does it move
This heart, after you, does not even stabilize

For an age we have been sleepless in longing for him
That moon which does not even descend into the courtyard

Then in the heart, scenes of your memory are illuminated
In such a state, there is no one to even see
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: محبت کی اسیری سے رہائی مانگتے رہنا
TITLE_EN: Keep asking for freedom from the imprisonment of love
CONTENT:
محبت کی اسیری سے رہائی مانگتے رہنا
بہت آساں نہیں ہوتا جدائی مانگتے رہنا

ذرا سا عشق کر لینا، ذرا سی آنکھ بھر لینا
عوض اس کے مگر ساری خدائی مانگتے رہنا

کبھی محروم ہونٹوں پر دعا کا حرف رکھ دینا
کبھی وحشت میں اس کی نارسائی مانگتے رہنا
TRANSLATION_EN:
Keep asking for freedom from the imprisonment of love
It is not very easy to keep asking for separation

To love a little, to fill the eyes a little
But in return, keep asking for all of divinity

Sometimes place the word of prayer on deprived lips
Sometimes in madness, keep asking for his inadequacy
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: راستوں میں رہے، نہ گھر میں رہے
TITLE_EN: Remained in paths, not in home
CONTENT:
راستوں میں رہے، نہ گھر میں رہے
عمر بھر حالتِ سفر میں رہے

لفظ سارے چراغ بن جائیں
وصف ایسا مرے ہنر میں رہے

زہر سارا شجر میں آ جائے
اے خدا زندگی ثمر میں رہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
Remained in paths, not in home
Remained in the state of travel all life

May all words become lamps
May such description remain in my craft

May all poison come into the tree
O God, may life remain in the fruit
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کوئی مجھ کو مرا بھرپور سراپا لا دے
TITLE_EN: Someone bring me my complete being
CONTENT:
کوئی مجھ کو مرا بھرپور سراپا لا دے
مرے بازو، مری آنکھیں، میرا چہرہ لا دے

ایسا دریا جو کسی اور سمندر میں گرے
اس سے بہتر ہے کہ مجھ کو مرا صحرا لا دے

کچھ نہیں چاہیے تجھ سے اے میری عمرِ رواں
میرا بچپن، مرے جگنو، مری گڑیا لا دے
TRANSLATION_EN:
Someone bring me my complete being
Bring my arms, my eyes, my face

Such a river that falls into another ocean
Better than that, bring me my desert

I want nothing from you, O my flowing life
Bring my childhood, my fireflies, my doll
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کوئی موسم ہو وصل و ہجر کا
TITLE_EN: Whatever season of union and separation it may be
CONTENT:
کوئی موسم ہو وصل و ہجر کا
ہم یاد رکھتے ہیں

تری باتوں سے اس دل کو
بہت آباد رکھتے ہیں

کبھی دل کے صحیفے پر
تجھے تصویر کرتے ہیں
TRANSLATION_EN:
Whatever season of union and separation it may be
We remember

With your words, this heart
We keep very inhabited

Sometimes on the pages of the heart
We sketch you
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: مجھ کو رسوا سرِ بازار نہ کروایا کرے
TITLE_EN: May I not be disgraced in the marketplace
CONTENT:
مجھ کو رسوا سرِ بازار نہ کروایا کرے
کاش آنسو میری آنکھوں میں ہی رہ جایا کرے

اے ہوا میں نے تو بس اس کا پتہ پوچھا تھا
اب کہانی تو نہ ہر بات کی بن جایا کرے

بس بہت دیکھ لیے خواب سہانے دن کے
اب وہ باتوں کی رفاقت سے نہ بہلایا کرے
TRANSLATION_EN:
May I not be disgraced in the marketplace
If only tears would remain in my eyes

O wind, I only asked for his address
Now don't turn every matter into a story

I've seen enough pleasant dreams of the day
Now don't console me with the companionship of words
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کتنا مشکل ہے زندگی کرنا
TITLE_EN: How difficult it is to live life
CONTENT:
کتنا مشکل ہے زندگی کرنا
جس طرح تجھ سے دوستی کرنا

اک کہانی نہ اور بن جائے
تم بات سرسری کرنا

ڈوب جاؤں نہ میں اندھیروں میں
اپنی آنکھوں کی روشنی کرنا
TRANSLATION_EN:
How difficult it is to live life
Just like making friends with you

Lest another story be created
You make the conversation casual

Lest I drown in darkness
Make the light of your eyes
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کبھی ہم بھیگتے ہیں چاہتوں کی تیز بارش میں
TITLE_EN: Sometimes we get drenched in the heavy rain of desires
CONTENT:
کبھی ہم بھیگتے ہیں چاہتوں کی تیز بارش میں
کبھی برسوں نہیں ملتے کسی ہلکی سی رنجش میں

تمہیں دیوتاؤں کی کوئی خوشبو نہ تھی ورنہ
کمی کوئی نہیں تھی میرے اندازِ پرستش میں

یہ سوچ لو پھر اور بھی تنہا نہ ہو جانا
اسے چھونے کی خواہش میں اسے پانے کی خواہش میں
TRANSLATION_EN:
Sometimes we get drenched in the heavy rain of desires
Sometimes we don't meet for years in some minor resentment

You had no fragrance of gods, otherwise
There was no deficiency in my style of worship

Think about this, then don't become even more lonely
In the desire to touch him, in the desire to attain him
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: دل میرا اک کتاب کی صورت
TITLE_EN: My heart is like a book
CONTENT:
دل میرا اک کتاب کی صورت
جس میں وہ ہے گلاب کی صورت

ہم سے پوچھو کہ ہم گزار آئے
زندگی کو عذاب کی صورت

حسن کچے گھڑے کا شیدائی تھا
عشق موجِ چناب کی صورت
TRANSLATION_EN:
My heart is like a book
In which he is like a rose

Ask us how we passed
Life in the form of torment

Beauty was enamored of an unbaked pot
Love like the wave of Chenab
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: تیری خوشبو نہیں ملتی، تیرا لہجہ نہیں ملتا
TITLE_EN: Your fragrance is not found, your tone is not found
CONTENT:
تیری خوشبو نہیں ملتی، تیرا لہجہ نہیں ملتا
ہمیں تو شہر میں کوئی تیرے جیسا نہیں ملتا

یہ کیسی دھند میں ہم تم سفر آغاز کر بیٹھے
تمہیں آنکھیں نہیں ملتیں، ہمیں چہرہ نہیں ملتا

ہر اک تدبیر اپنے رائیگاں ٹھہری محبت میں
کسی بھی خواب کو تعبیر کا راستہ نہیں ملتا
TRANSLATION_EN:
Your fragrance is not found, your tone is not found
In the city, we find no one like you

In what kind of fog did we begin our journey?
You don't find eyes, we don't find a face

Every strategy proved futile in love
No dream finds the path to interpretation
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: تم نے تو کہہ دیا کہ محبت نہیں ملی
TITLE_EN: You declared that love was not found
CONTENT:
تم نے تو کہہ دیا کہ محبت نہیں ملی
مجھ کو تو یہ بھی کہنے کی مہلت نہیں ملی

نیندوں کے دیس جاتے کوئی خواب دیکھتے
لیکن دیا جلانے سے فرصت نہیں ملی

تجھ کو تو خیر شہر کے لوگوں کا خوف تھا
اور مجھ کو اپنے گھر سے اجازت نہیں ملی
TRANSLATION_EN:
You declared that love was not found
I didn't even get the chance to say this

Going to the land of sleeps, we would see some dreams
But didn't get leisure to light the lamp

You, well, had fear of the city's people
And I didn't get permission from my own home
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: محبتیں جب شمار کرنا تو سازشیں بھی شمار کرنا
TITLE_EN: When you count loves, count the conspiracies too
CONTENT:
محبتیں جب شمار کرنا تو سازشیں بھی شمار کرنا
جو میرے حصے میں آئی ہیں وہ اذیتیں بھی شمار کرنا

جلائے رکھوں گی صبح تک میں تمہارے راستے میں اپنی آنکھیں
مگر کہیں ضبط ٹوٹ جائے تو بارشیں بھی شمار کرنا

جو حرف لوحِ وفا پہ لکھے ہوئے ہیں ان کو بھی دیکھ لینا
جو رائیگاں ہو گئیں وہ ساری عبادتیں بھی شمار کرنا
TRANSLATION_EN:
When you count loves, count the conspiracies too
Count the torments that came to my share

I will keep my eyes lit in your path until morning
But if somewhere my composure breaks, count the rains too

Look at those words written on the tablet of fidelity too
Count all those prayers that went in vain too
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: شال بھیجو ناں! مجھے اوڑھی ہوئی اپنی تم
TITLE_EN: Send me a shawl! Wearing it as your own
CONTENT:
شال بھیجو ناں! مجھے اوڑھی ہوئی اپنی تم
میں ترے لمس میں کچھ دیر کو جینا چاہوں

وہ بھی کیا دن تھے کہ ہر شام ملاقات ہوتی
اب تو یوں ہے کہ کسی سے بھی نہ ملنا چاہوں

اس کے بعد اسے بھولنے کی کوشش کیا
اس سے پہلے کہ وہ یاد آئے میں سو جاؤں
TRANSLATION_EN:
Send me a shawl! Wearing it as your own
I want to live for a while in your touch

What days those were when we met every evening
Now it's such that I don't want to meet anyone

After that, what effort to forget him?
Before he comes to memory, I fall asleep
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: تم نے سوچا تھا کہ ہم بھول گئے
TITLE_EN: You thought that we had forgotten
CONTENT:
تم نے سوچا تھا کہ ہم بھول گئے
بات یہ ہے کہ تمہیں یاد نہیں

کتنی برسوں کی مسافت ہے
پھر بھی لگتا ہے کل کی رات نہیں

دل کے ویرانے میں اک شمع جلے
کوئی کہتا ہے کوئی بات نہیں
TRANSLATION_EN:
You thought that we had forgotten
The thing is, you don't remember

What a distance of so many years
Yet it doesn't feel like last night

In the desolation of the heart, a candle burns
Someone says, it's nothing
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کے بعد اسے بھولنے کی کوشش کیا
TITLE_EN: After that, what effort to forget him?
CONTENT:
اس کے بعد اسے بھولنے کی کوشش کیا
اس سے پہلے کہ وہ یاد آئے میں سو جاؤں

کتنی مشکل ہے یہاں دور کا رشتہ نوشیؔ
پھر بھی اس شخص سے دل چاہے لگا رہوں
TRANSLATION_EN:
After that, what effort to forget him?
Before he comes to memory, I fall asleep

How difficult is a distant relationship here, Noshi
Yet the heart wants to keep attached to that person
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: وہ ملے تو بات کرنے کو جی چاہے
TITLE_EN: If he meets, the heart desires to talk
CONTENT:
وہ ملے تو بات کرنے کو جی چاہے
وہ نہ ملے تو مر جائیں کیا کریں

دل کو سمجھائیے اک بار تو مانے
یہ نا سمجھ ہے اس کو کیا کریں

نوشیؔ اب اس شہر میں کس سے کہیں
بات کرنی ہے مگر بات نہیں
TRANSLATION_EN:
If he meets, the heart desires to talk
If he doesn't meet, we might die, what to do?

Try to explain to the heart, if only it would listen once
It is foolish, what to do with it?

Noshi, now in this city, who should we tell?
We want to talk, but there's no conversation
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: میں نے اس شخص کو کھویا ہے کئی بار مگر
TITLE_EN: I have lost that person many times, but
CONTENT:
میں نے اس شخص کو کھویا ہے کئی بار مگر
ہر دفعہ اس کی محبت نے پکارا مجھ کو

اب تو عادت سی ہے مجھ کو بھی بچھڑنے کی مگر
یوں بھی ہوتا ہے کوئی خواب سنوارا مجھ کو
TRANSLATION_EN:
I have lost that person many times, but
Each time, his love called out to me

Now I too have almost gotten used to separation, but
Sometimes a dream is also crafted for me
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی باتیں تو بہت یاد ہیں مجھ کو
TITLE_EN: I remember his words very well
CONTENT:
اس کی باتیں تو بہت یاد ہیں مجھ کو
اس کا چہرہ ہے ذرا دھندلا سا

یوں تو گزرے ہیں برس کئی نوشیؔ
پر وہ لمحہ ہے ابھی تک زندہ سا
TRANSLATION_EN:
I remember his words very well
His face is a little blurred

Many years have passed like this, Noshi
But that moment is still somewhat alive
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: شام ہوئی تو پھر وہ یاد آیا
TITLE_EN: When evening came, he was remembered again
CONTENT:
شام ہوئی تو پھر وہ یاد آیا
جس کا ملنا بھی تھا جدا ہونا

اس کی آنکھوں میں ڈوب جاتی ہوں
اس کی باتوں میں کھو گئی ہوں میں

نوشیؔ اب یوں لگتا ہے جیسے
زندگی بھی اس کے بعد ہے رونا
TRANSLATION_EN:
When evening came, he was remembered again
Whose meeting itself was separation

I drown in his eyes
I have lost myself in his words

Noshi, now it seems as if
Life after him is just crying
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کے بعد ہر اک شخص میں اس کا عکس ہے
TITLE_EN: After him, his reflection is in every person
CONTENT:
اس کے بعد ہر اک شخص میں اس کا عکس ہے
چہرے بدل بدل کے وہ آتا ہے بار بار

یوں لگتا ہے جیسے وقت تھما ہے یہیں
اور وہ شخص ہے اب تک انتظار
TRANSLATION_EN:
After him, his reflection is in every person
Changing faces, he comes again and again

It feels as if time has stopped right here
And that person is still waiting
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: بھولنے کی دھوپ میں جلتی رہی
TITLE_EN: I kept burning in the sun of forgetting
CONTENT:
بھولنے کی دھوپ میں جلتی رہی
یاد کے سائے تلے پلتی رہی

اس نے پوچھا تھا کہ کیسی ہو تم
میں نے کہا اس کے بغیر مرتی رہی
TRANSLATION_EN:
I kept burning in the sun of forgetting
Kept growing under the shade of memory

He had asked, how are you?
I said, without him, I kept dying
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی خوشبو نے پھر گھیر لیا
TITLE_EN: His fragrance surrounded me again
CONTENT:
اس کی خوشبو نے پھر گھیر لیا
رات بھر جاگی میں سوتی رہی

اس کی باتیں کہ دل پہ لکھی تھیں
آنکھوں میں آباد رہیں وہ ساری
TRANSLATION_EN:
His fragrance surrounded me again
I stayed awake all night, kept sleeping

His words that were written on the heart
All of them remained dwelling in my eyes
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کے بعد کبھی ملنا نہ ملنا
TITLE_EN: After him, meeting or not meeting
CONTENT:
اس کے بعد کبھی ملنا نہ ملنا
دونوں میں کچھ فرق نہیں رہا

دور رہ کر بھی وہ پاس رہا
پاس رہ کر بھی وہ دور رہا

نوشیؔ اب اس شہر میں کس کو بتائیں
وہ شخص ملا بھی تو کیا ملا
TRANSLATION_EN:
After him, meeting or not meeting
There's no difference in either

Even staying away, he remained near
Even staying near, he remained far

Noshi, now in this city, who should we tell?
Even when we met that person, what did we get?
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: درد کا کچھ تو حساب رکھتی
TITLE_EN: Life keeps some account of pain
CONTENT:
درد کا کچھ تو حساب رکھتی
زندگی بھی کچھ خراب رکھتی

یوں تو ہر شخص ملتا ہے ہم کو
پر کوئی دل کا عذاب رکھتی
TRANSLATION_EN:
Life keeps some account of pain
Also keeps some ruin

Like this, every person meets us
But someone keeps the torment of the heart
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: رات بھر چاندنی میں جاگا ہوں
TITLE_EN: I have stayed awake all night in moonlight
CONTENT:
رات بھر چاندنی میں جاگا ہوں
اس کی یادوں کے ساتھ جاگا ہوں

کوئی تو ہے جو پوچھے حال دل
ورنہ میں تو بہت تھکا ہوں
TRANSLATION_EN:
I have stayed awake all night in moonlight
I have stayed awake with his memories

If only someone would ask the state of my heart
Otherwise, I am very tired
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی یاد بھی اب ڈھلنے لگی ہے
TITLE_EN: Even his memory is now beginning to fade
CONTENT:
اس کی یاد بھی اب ڈھلنے لگی ہے
جیسے شام ڈھلے تو رات آئے

کتنے برسوں کی مسافت ہے نوشیؔ
پر وہ شخص اب بھی ساتھ آئے
TRANSLATION_EN:
Even his memory is now beginning to fade
As when evening declines and night comes

What a journey of so many years, Noshi
But that person still comes along
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کبھی وہ آئے تو باتوں میں کھو جائیں
TITLE_EN: Sometimes when he comes, we lose ourselves in conversations
CONTENT:
کبھی وہ آئے تو باتوں میں کھو جائیں
کبھی نہ آئے تو راتوں میں کھو جائیں

نوشیؔ اس شہر کی ویرانیوں میں
ہم تو خود کو بھی بھول جائیں
TRANSLATION_EN:
Sometimes when he comes, we lose ourselves in conversations
Sometimes when he doesn't come, we lose ourselves in nights

Noshi, in the desolations of this city
We forget even ourselves
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کے بعد جو بھی ملا اس جیسا ملا
TITLE_EN: After him, whoever I met was like him
CONTENT:
اس کے بعد جو بھی ملا اس جیسا ملا
اس لیے شاید اسے بھول نہ پائی

کتنی بار سوچا کہ اب بھول ہی جائیں
پر وہ خواب تو آنکھوں میں سمایا
TRANSLATION_EN:
After him, whoever I met was like him
That's why perhaps I couldn't forget him

How many times I thought, now let's just forget
But that dream had merged into my eyes
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: وہ شخص جب ملا تو لگا جیسے
TITLE_EN: When I met that person, it felt as if
CONTENT:
وہ شخص جب ملا تو لگا جیسے
سارے موسم بدل گئے ہوں

جب وہ نہیں تو یوں لگتا ہے
سارے چہرے بدل گئے ہوں
TRANSLATION_EN:
When I met that person, it felt as if
All seasons had changed

When he is not here, it feels as if
All faces have changed
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کے بعد جو بھی ملا ادھورا تھا
TITLE_EN: After him, whoever I met was incomplete
CONTENT:
اس کے بعد جو بھی ملا ادھورا تھا
جیسے کوئی خواب ہو ادھورا سا

نوشیؔ اب اس شہر میں کیا ڈھونڈیں
وہ تو ملا تھا پورا پورا
TRANSLATION_EN:
After him, whoever I met was incomplete
Like some dream that is half-finished

Noshi, now what should we search for in this city?
He was the one who came complete, completely
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: وہ ملے تو ہم کو یقین آئے
TITLE_EN: When he meets, we come to believe
CONTENT:
وہ ملے تو ہم کو یقین آئے
کہ ابھی دنیا میں خوشیاں باقی ہیں

جب وہ نہیں تو لگتا ہے نوشیؔ
زندگی بھی کوئی راہی نہیں
TRANSLATION_EN:
When he meets, we come to believe
That there are still joys left in the world

When he is not here, it seems, Noshi
That even life is no traveler
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کبھی وہ آئے تو لگے جیسے
TITLE_EN: Sometimes when he comes, it feels as if
CONTENT:
کبھی وہ آئے تو لگے جیسے
ساری راتیں جاگیں ساری

جب وہ نہ آئے تو لگے جیسے
سب نے مجھ کو چھوڑ دیا
TRANSLATION_EN:
Sometimes when he comes, it feels as if
All nights have awakened, all of them

When he doesn't come, it feels as if
Everyone has left me
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی ہنسی کی گونج اب تک ہے
TITLE_EN: The echo of his laughter still remains
CONTENT:
اس کی ہنسی کی گونج اب تک ہے
کمرے کے کونے کونے میں

وہ شخص تو چلا گیا بہت دور
پر اس کی باتیں ہیں قریب اب بھی
TRANSLATION_EN:
The echo of his laughter still remains
In every corner of the room

That person has gone very far
But his words are still near
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: دور رہ کر بھی وہ پاس رہا
TITLE_EN: Even staying away, he remained near
CONTENT:
دور رہ کر بھی وہ پاس رہا
بات یہ ہے کہ دل کے پاس رہا

اس کے بعد جو بھی آیا گیا
اس جیسا کوئی خاص نہ رہا
TRANSLATION_EN:
Even staying away, he remained near
The thing is, he remained near the heart

After him, whoever came and went
No one special like him remained
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی آنکھوں میں ڈوبنے کا مزہ کچھ اور تھا
TITLE_EN: The pleasure of drowning in his eyes was something else
CONTENT:
اس کی آنکھوں میں ڈوبنے کا مزہ کچھ اور تھا
اب تو آنکھیں ملتی ہیں تو پانی سا لگتا ہے

اس کی باتوں میں کھونے کا مزہ کچھ اور تھا
اب تو باتیں ہوتی ہیں تو کہانی سا لگتا ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
The pleasure of drowning in his eyes was something else
Now when eyes meet, it feels like water

The pleasure of losing myself in his words was something else
Now when conversations happen, it feels like a story
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: وہ شخص میری طرح تھکا ہوا تھا شاید
TITLE_EN: That person was perhaps as tired as me
CONTENT:
وہ شخص میری طرح تھکا ہوا تھا شاید
اس لیے بہت جلدی چلا گیا

نوشیؔ اب اس شہر میں کون پوچھے
کیوں اتنا اداس ہوں کیوں چپ ہوں
TRANSLATION_EN:
That person was perhaps as tired as me
That's why he left very quickly

Noshi, now in this city, who will ask
Why I am so sad, why I am so silent
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی یادوں کے جال میں پھنس کر
TITLE_EN: Trapped in the web of his memories
CONTENT:
اس کی یادوں کے جال میں پھنس کر
کتنی بار نکلنے کی کوشش کی

اس نے چاہا تو مجھ کو بھول گیا
میں نے چاہا تو اسے بھول نہ پائی
TRANSLATION_EN:
Trapped in the web of his memories
How many times I tried to escape

When he wanted, he forgot me
When I wanted, I couldn't forget him
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: رات بھر جاگی میں سوچتی رہی
TITLE_EN: I stayed awake all night, kept thinking
CONTENT:
رات بھر جاگی میں سوچتی رہی
وہ شخص کیوں ملنے نہیں آتا

صبح ہوئی تو پتہ چلا نوشیؔ
وہ تو کب کا دوسرے گھر جا بسا
TRANSLATION_EN:
I stayed awake all night, kept thinking
Why doesn't that person come to meet?

When morning came, I found out, Noshi
He had long ago settled in another home
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کے بعد جو بھی آیا مہمان بنا
TITLE_EN: After him, whoever came became a guest
CONTENT:
اس کے بعد جو بھی آیا مہمان بنا
کوئی اس جیسا اپنا نہ ملا

نوشیؔ اب اس شہر کی گلیوں میں
ہر قدم پر اس کا سایہ ملا
TRANSLATION_EN:
After him, whoever came became a guest
No one like him was found as our own

Noshi, now in the lanes of this city
On every step, his shadow is found
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کبھی وہ آئے تو پوچھیں کیسے ہو
TITLE_EN: Sometimes when he comes, they ask how are you
CONTENT:
کبھی وہ آئے تو پوچھیں کیسے ہو
کبھی نہ آئے تو پوچھیں کیوں نہ آئے

اس کے بعد جو بھی ملا پوچھتا ہے
وہ شخص کیوں تم کو بھول گیا

نوشیؔ اب اس سوال کا جواب کیا دوں
کہ میں خود بھی اسے ڈھونڈتی پھرتی ہوں
TRANSLATION_EN:
Sometimes when he comes, they ask how are you
Sometimes when he doesn't come, they ask why didn't he come

After him, whoever I meet asks
Why did that person forget you

Noshi, now what answer should I give to this question
That I myself wander around searching for him
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی آنکھوں میں سمندر تھا کوئی
TITLE_EN: In his eyes, there was some ocean
CONTENT:
اس کی آنکھوں میں سمندر تھا کوئی
اس کی باتوں میں سحر تھا کوئی

یوں تو کتنے ہی ملتے جلتے تھے
پر اس میں اور ہی گھر تھا کوئی

نوشیؔ اب اس شہر کی رونقیں
پوچھتی ہیں وہ سفر تھا کوئی
TRANSLATION_EN:
In his eyes, there was some ocean
In his words, there was some enchantment

Many were similar like this
But in him, there was some other dwelling

Noshi, now the splendors of this city
Ask, was that some journey?
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کچھ تو ہے جو اس نے چھوڑ دیا
TITLE_EN: There is something that he left behind
CONTENT:
کچھ تو ہے جو اس نے چھوڑ دیا
کچھ تو ہے جو دل توڑ دیا

اس کے بعد یوں لگتا ہے نوشیؔ
جیسے ہم نے سب کچھ کھو دیا
TRANSLATION_EN:
There is something that he left behind
There is something that broke the heart

After him, it seems, Noshi
As if we have lost everything
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی یاد آئی تو سوچا
TITLE_EN: When his memory came, I thought
CONTENT:
اس کی یاد آئی تو سوچا
کب تک یوں جلتی رہوں گی

اس نے تو کچھ بھی نہیں کھویا
میں کیوں سب کچھ کھو بیٹھی
TRANSLATION_EN:
When his memory came, I thought
How long will I keep burning like this?

He didn't lose anything at all
Why did I lose everything?
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: تم نے کہا تھا بھول جاؤ گے
TITLE_EN: You had said you would forget
CONTENT:
تم نے کہا تھا بھول جاؤ گے
تم تو بھول گئے ہم بھول گئے

پر وہ لمحہ جو ساتھ گزارا تھا
وہ اب تک ہے نہ بھول سکے
TRANSLATION_EN:
You had said you would forget
You forgot, we forgot

But that moment we spent together
That still remains, we couldn't forget
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کے بعد جو بھی ملا
TITLE_EN: After him, whoever I met
CONTENT:
اس کے بعد جو بھی ملا
اس کا عکس تھا کوئی نہ ملا

نوشیؔ اس شہر کی گلیوں میں
ہم اسے ڈھونڈتے پھرتے ہیں
TRANSLATION_EN:
After him, whoever I met
Was his reflection, no one was found

Noshi, in the lanes of this city
We wander searching for him
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: وہ شخص میرے پاس تھا تھوڑی دیر
TITLE_EN: That person was with me for a little while
CONTENT:
وہ شخص میرے پاس تھا تھوڑی دیر
پر وہ تھوڑی دیر بہت تھی

اس کے بعد کی ساری عمر
اس تھوڑی دیر کی قید میں ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
That person was with me for a little while
But that little while was a lot

All of life after that
Is imprisoned in that little while
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی باتیں سننے کو دل چاہے
TITLE_EN: The heart desires to hear his words
CONTENT:
اس کی باتیں سننے کو دل چاہے
اس کے ملنے کو جی چاہے

پر وہ ملے تو لگے جیسے
پھر کوئی اور بچھڑ جائے گا
TRANSLATION_EN:
The heart desires to hear his words
The soul desires to meet him

But if he meets, it feels as if
Then someone else will be separated
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: دور تک پھیلی ہے تنہائی نوشیؔ
TITLE_EN: Loneliness has spread far and wide, Noshi
CONTENT:
دور تک پھیلی ہے تنہائی نوشیؔ
کوئی اپنا سا نہیں ملتا

اس شخص کے جانے کے بعد
اب کوئی اپنا نہیں ملتا
TRANSLATION_EN:
Loneliness has spread far and wide, Noshi
No one like our own is found

After that person left
Now no one like our own is found
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: وہ ملے تو خوشی ہوتی ہے
TITLE_EN: If he meets, there is happiness
CONTENT:
وہ ملے تو خوشی ہوتی ہے
وہ نہ ملے تو غم ہوتا ہے

دونوں صورت میں نقصان ہے
دل تو ہر بار جلتا ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
If he meets, there is happiness
If he doesn't meet, there is sorrow

In both cases, there is loss
The heart burns every time
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: رات بھر ہم نے سوچا
TITLE_EN: All night we thought
CONTENT:
رات بھر ہم نے سوچا
وہ شخص کیوں بھول گیا

صبح ہوئی تو پتہ چلا
ہم خود کو بھول گئے
TRANSLATION_EN:
All night we thought
Why did that person forget?

When morning came, we found out
We forgot ourselves
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی یاد میں کھو کر دیکھا
TITLE_EN: I tried losing myself in his memory
CONTENT:
اس کی یاد میں کھو کر دیکھا
دل کے شہر میں جا کر دیکھا

وہ شخص تو کھو گیا اپنے میں
ہم نے اس کو پا کر دیکھا
TRANSLATION_EN:
I tried losing myself in his memory
I tried going into the city of the heart

That person was lost in himself
I tried finding him
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کچھ تو ہے جو اس کے بعد
TITLE_EN: There is something that after him
CONTENT:
کچھ تو ہے جو اس کے بعد
زندگی سی لگتی نہیں

وہ نہیں تو یوں لگتا ہے
کوئی بھی اب ملتا نہیں
TRANSLATION_EN:
There is something that after him
Life doesn't feel like life

When he is not here, it feels
No one is found now
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی آنکھوں کی گہرائی میں
TITLE_EN: In the depth of his eyes
CONTENT:
اس کی آنکھوں کی گہرائی میں
کتنے خواب ڈوبے ہوں گے

اس نے چاہا تو ہنس دیا ہو گا
اس نے چاہا تو رو دیا ہو گا
TRANSLATION_EN:
In the depth of his eyes
How many dreams must have drowned

If he wanted, he must have laughed
If he wanted, he must have cried
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی باتوں میں مٹھاس تھی کوئی
TITLE_EN: In his words, there was some sweetness
CONTENT:
اس کی باتوں میں مٹھاس تھی کوئی
اس کے لہجے میں پیاس تھی کوئی

وہ جو مل کر بھی نہ مل سکا
اس میں اور ہی بات تھی کوئی
TRANSLATION_EN:
In his words, there was some sweetness
In his tone, there was some thirst

He who even after meeting could not be attained
In him, there was something else entirely
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کے بعد جو بھی آیا
TITLE_EN: After him, whoever came
CONTENT:
اس کے بعد جو بھی آیا
اس سے اس کا سوال کیا

نوشیؔ اس شہر میں اب
دل کو سنبھالنا مشکل ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
After him, whoever came
I asked him about him

Noshi, in this city now
It's difficult to handle the heart
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: وہ شخص جب یاد آتا ہے
TITLE_EN: When that person is remembered
CONTENT:
وہ شخص جب یاد آتا ہے
دن ڈھلتا ہے رات آتی ہے

پھر آنکھوں سے برسات آتی ہے
پھر دل میں ملال آتا ہے
TRANSLATION_EN:
When that person is remembered
The day declines, night comes

Then from the eyes, rain comes
Then in the heart, sorrow comes
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کی محبت کا صلہ کیا دوں
TITLE_EN: What reward should I give for his love?
CONTENT:
اس کی محبت کا صلہ کیا دوں
اس کے احساں کا بدلہ کیا دوں

اس نے مجھ کو خود سے جدا کیا
اب اس جدا ہونے کا گلہ کیا دوں
TRANSLATION_EN:
What reward should I give for his love?
What compensation for his favors?

He separated me from himself
Now what complaint should I make of this separation?
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: کبھی وہ آئے تو بات چھڑے
TITLE_EN: Sometimes when he comes, conversation begins
CONTENT:
کبھی وہ آئے تو بات چھڑے
کبھی نہ آئے تو رات کٹے

نوشیؔ اس شخص کے آنے جانے میں
ساری عمر کٹ گئی
TRANSLATION_EN:
Sometimes when he comes, conversation begins
Sometimes when he doesn't come, the night passes

Noshi, in the coming and going of that person
My entire life has passed
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: اس کے بعد کبھی ملا ہی نہیں
TITLE_EN: After him, I never met anyone
CONTENT:
اس کے بعد کبھی ملا ہی نہیں
کوئی اس جیسا ملا ہی نہیں

نوشیؔ اس شہر کی ویرانی میں
ہم نے کتنے چہرے بدلے
پر اس کا چہرہ نہ بدلا
TRANSLATION_EN:
After him, I never met anyone
No one like him was ever found

Noshi, in the desolation of this city
We changed so many faces
But his face never changed
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.

TITLE_UR: وہ شخص جب ملا تو لگا جیسے
TITLE_EN: When that person was met, it felt as if
CONTENT:
وہ شخص جب ملا تو لگا جیسے
سارے موسم بدل گئے ہوں

جب وہ نہیں تو یوں لگتا ہے
سارے چہرے بدل گئے ہوں
TRANSLATION_EN:
When that person was met, it felt as if
All seasons had changed

When he is not here, it feels as if
All faces have changed
notes: This ghazal content is sourced from verified published or online sources (e.g., Rekhta.org, Archive.org). AI assistance was used only for tokenization and structured JSON generation. All text, RADIF, QAAFIYA, and translations have been manually verified for accuracy.
